title: Why Self-Help Books Might Be Making You Worse | The Hidden Ideology of Self-Improvement
description: A comprehensive critical examination of the self-help industry. Why do heavy self-help readers often report lower life satisfaction? In this video, we explore the hidden ideology behind the self-improvement industry, including Erich Fromm's Having vs Being modes, the neoliberal origins of self-help culture, toxic positivity, and evidence-based alternatives like self-efficacy.
